title: Spot The Difference
description: Sit down, relax and enjoy roaming through countless colorful and interesting pictures, find all the differences in those pictures and progress through all the stages. Enjoy the calming music and the beautiful sceneries.
instructions: Pay attention to all the differences in the pictures, find them without using any clues to get all the stars, discover all the game modes and unlock all levels.

title: Block Hexa Puzzle (New)
description: This is a typical puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is the "Hexagon" version of the classic Tetris game. Drag the hexagon blocks and drop them to the desired places, to form full lines in order to destroy them and earn scores. PLAY NOW AND HAVE FUN!
instructions: Drag and drop

title: Hidden Objects Hello Love
description: Try this sweet Valentine's Day hidden objects game. Find all objects on the screen before the time runs out. 16 love levels full of items to get cleaned. Can you fulfill the goal? Only one way to find out.
instructions: List of objects to find is on the left side of the screen. Find them on the scene before the time runs out. If you get stuck, tap on the hint button. Use magnifying glass button to zoom the scene (you can also drag the screen around in this mode)

title: Lovely Couples Memory
description: "Lovely Couples Memory" is an engaging memory card puzzle game. Click the cards to reveal a couple and memorize them so you can match them with similar cards. Your objective is to match all the cards on the board to complete each level. Test your memory skills and find the lovely couples!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Village Of Monsters
description: "Village Of Monsters" is a thrilling match 3 game. Swap blocks to create groups of 3 or more identical candies either horizontally or vertically. Continue matching to unlock and clear all the tiles. Utilize power-ups to expedite the process. With 36 captivating levels, the village is counting on you!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Among Us Smash
description: Among Us Smash is a game with Among Us balloons. There is different colors on among us balloons and you need to smash it. Smash all balloons except the blue balloons. You have the right to smash the blue balloons three times. After that the game will end. Be careful because sometimes the balloons come in a group of several balloons and there is a blue balloon hidden between them, so when you smash the others, the blue one will smash as well. Smash as many balloons as you can and get the best result.
instructions: Tap on balloons to play this game.

title: Happy Glass Puzzles 3
description: Draw a path for the water to flow to the cup. Fill up the cup to the goal level to complete each level in this fun online puzzle game. Try to complete all of the different puzzles in the third installment of Happy Glass Puzzles.
instructions: Use mouse or finger to draw

title: Among Them Puzzles
description: Welcome to the world of Impostors and Crewmates! In this game you have 12 puzzles with pictures from Among Us. Assemble them by changing to place the pieces. To change drag parts up to another position. Completed a level, go to the next. In each level you have limited time for which need to complete it.
instructions: Use mouse on desktop or touch buttons on your mobile device.

title: Anime Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Anime Jigsaw Puzzles is a fun puzzle game with amazing anime graphics. There are 6 unique levels, each with beautiful anime picture. Play Anime Jigsaw Puzzles now for great fun!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Winter Pets Puzzle
description: Play with 6 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Winter Pets Puzzle. All images is with the pets in winter. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 games.

title: Chain Cube 2048 3D
description: Have you ever played 2048? This is the 3D cube version of 2048. All you have to do is shoot out the number blocks and merge as many as 2048 to win the game!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Animal Puzzles
description: Let's play our new puzzle game called Animal Puzzles. In this game you have 12 puzzles with animals pictures. Assemble them by changing to place the pieces. To change drag parts up to another position. Completed a level, go to the next. In each level you have limited time for which need to complete it.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Fruitlinker
description: "Fruitlinker" is a captivating Mahjong linking game that adds a fruity twist to the classic board game. Your task is to match two identical blocks, but here's the challenge – the connecting line between two matching blocks can have only two turns. Dive into this unique version of Mahjong as you make connections between the matching fruit tiles. Race against the clock and test your skills. Can you clear the board of all the fruity pairs before time runs out?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Christmas Santa Slide
description: Play this slide puzzle games of the christmas santa. It's include 3 images and 3 modes (3x3 pieces, 4x4 pieces, 5x5 pieces) to play.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 games.

title: Monster Destroyer
description: This is a game where you need to destroy blocks (wooden, metal, and explosive) to help the monster come to a different monster. This game has several levels and in each level you have to think carefully about how to get to the other monster.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Snake Puzzle
description: The snakes are trapped! Need your help to escape. Very simple but brain-burning casual puzzle game, here are 275 levels waiting for you to crack! Be careful not to get dizzy! Don't move the snake into a dead-end either~
instructions: Drag to play.

title: Car Park Puzzle
description: What a parking mess! Find a way to move your car out of the parking lot. Beautiful car parking lot and 24 challenging levels. Feeling stuck? Use the hints system to help
instructions: Move your car out of the parking lot

title: Lines
description: Lines is an abstract ‘zen’ game experience where form is just as important as function. Place or remove dots to initiate a colourful race that fills a drawing. The colour that dominates the race wins. Lines is the perfect game to play while commuting or in other short moments of downtime. Play a single session in a matter of seconds or find yourself making a winning streak of 20 games in a row!
instructions: Tap on a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one dot, other times two dots.

title: Filled Glass 2 No Gravity
description: Filled Glass 2: No Gravity is a fun online puzzle game. Click on the field outlined by a red rectangle and colored balls will sprinkle from there. You must fill the glass that is glued upside down to the top of the screen. The task is to fill the container to the level of the dotted line. When it turns green, stop backfilling. If at least one ball falls outside the dotted line, the level will have to be replayed. There will be many different obstacles on the way to filling, so that you do not get bored.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Rotated Cups
description: Rotated Cups is an interesting game for skills. Rotate the cup that holds the ball and drop the ball exactly into the designated bucket. Use the mouse or you finger to rotate the Cup, you have to send the ball to the right place. Have fun!
instructions: Click and drag to rotate the cups. Touch and drag to rotate the cups.

title: Christmas Penguin Puzzle
description: Play with 6 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Christmas Penguin Puzzle. All images is with the christmas penguin. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 christmas games.

title: Animals Jigsaw Puzzle Elephants
description: Drag and drop the all picture pieces to their exact locations to complete the pictures of the animals - elephants. The game comes with 8 pictures and three difficulties: 2x3, 3x4, 4x6.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 games.

title: Happy Fishing
description: This day promises to bring you the biggest catch or your life. But everything depends on you. Click on the screen to drop the fishhook and catch a fish. Don't miss it, or you can deliver a bomb to your ship!
instructions: Click or tap to drop the fishhook.

title: Brainstorm
description: Brainstorm - Tricky Test will train your brain with fun brain teasers. Don’t keep your mind idle. Make your mind think outside of the box to solve tricky puzzles. Do some brainstorming and find out your IQ level. Surely you must have a brain with logical thinking. Knowledge, smartness, and common sense will help you solve all tricky teasers.
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Dr Panda Airport
description: It's time to travel in Dr. Panda Airport! Reach new heights in this amazing game. Stamp passports at customs, make sure luggage makes it to the right plane and even take control to help planes land safely. Dr Panda Airport has 10 minigames for you to enjoy.
instructions: Click on the objects to interact with them.

title: Dr Panda Daycare
description: Animal parents bring their babies to Dr. Panda Daycare and it is your kid’s job to take care of them! Play with them, put them to bed or have a birthday party.
instructions: Click on the items to interact with them. Drag and drop items onto the characters.

title: Kids Hangman
description: Hangman Game is an educational and casual game that has the function of stimulating people's memories. Try to find the hidden words before completing the entire drawing. Play with your friends and try to beat new records with each game. Good luck and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse on desktop or touch buttons on your mobile device.

title: Mr Secret Agent
description: Mr Secret Agent is a fun 2D shooter game with amazing graphics and physics. Complete 50 levels in a puzzle shooting scenario. Play Mr Secret Agent now for amazing fun!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Scatty Maps Japan
description: Great educational game to help you learn about geography of Japan. Drag and drop maps of prefectures where they should be. You can see additional data like, capital, area and population. Pick to play it in English or Japanese.
instructions: The game has two modes, easy and full. In both of them, the aim is to drag and drop the map on the right place. You can make it a bit easier if you turn on 'help' mode, to see prefecture borders. You can also zoom the map to see the 'bigger' picture.

title: Mr Dracula
description: Mr Dracula is a fun puzzle and shooter game in a halloween theme. This game has the best physics shooter game there is. Play Mr Dracula now for amazing fun.
instructions: Tap to shoot

title: Donutosaur 2
description: Monster loves candy, but is dependent on you to get him to the sweets, or the sweets to him, in this physics puzzle game. Experts will collect all stars on the way to the each level's goal.
instructions: Collect candies by changing the shape of Donutosaur and switching the direction of gravity. Donutosaur's friends will be of great help - they can push, pull and destroy objects.

title: Bullet Man 3D
description: The position through which the bullet passes, leaving no room for evasion. Aim your gun at the enemy's position and destroy them. The enemy will not stay still, so you must also accurately determine if they will be able to dodge the bullets as they fly out! Come and try this arcade game!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Christmas Snowman Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Drag and drop the all picture pieces to their exact locations to complete the pictures of the christmas snowman. The game comes with 12 pictures and three difficulties: 2x3, 3x4, 4x6.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 christmas snowman jigsaw puzzle games.

title: Merry Christmas Slide
description: Play this slide puzzle games of the christmas. It's include 3 images and 3 modes (3x3 pieces, 4x4 pieces, 5x5 pieces) to play.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 games.

title: Christmas Memory Matching
description: This is Memory games with Christmas elements. This game has 30 levels and you have to go through all the levels to finish the game. But on some levels your time is shortened and you have to react fast and play faster to play the level in the time you are given. You have the opportunity to reset the level and continue from where you left off.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Merry Christmas Puzzle
description: Play with 6 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Merry Christmas Puzzles. All images is with the christmas. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 christmas games.

title: Release The Gift Boxes
description: In this game you have to make a tower of gifts. Touch the gift held by the pliers to release it and drop it on the other gifts. Try to keep the gifts from falling on top of each other without falling to the floor. Center and choose the right moment to release the gift. Earn maximum points and make the biggest tower of gifts. Tap on the screen to play this game called release the gift boxes.
instructions: Tap on gifts to play this game.

title: Christmas Mascots Memory
description: This is Christmas game with more levels. You need to click on Christmas cards and when they turn, a picture of Christmas mascots will appear. Pair two identical cards to make them disappear. Pass the game level before time runs out. Play all the levels and enjoy the holidays. Click on cards to play this game.
instructions: Tap on screen to play.

title: Christmas Capital Letters
description: In this Christmas game your job is to touch only capital letters. Be focused and fast. You can miss ten letters and you can make only 3 mistakes. Get the best score for this game and enjoy in holidays.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Xmas 2020 Sudoku
description: Sudoku is a famous logic puzzle games. If you like sudoku games, this Xmas 2020 Sudoku games is for you. In Xmas 2020 Sudoku, you task is to fill all the cells with christmas items. Each row, column or 3x3 cells must contain a christmas item exactly once.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 sudoku games.

title: Christmas Tree Memory Game
description: Christmas tree memory is a holiday game where you will test your memory. This is a game with Christmas trees, and when you click on the cards they will spin and a Christmas tree card will appear. Remember two identical cards and guess them. When you hit two identical cards they will disappear. Go through all the levels. Take care of the time you are given to play and enjoy the holidays and the games in g8-games.com.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Santa Present Delivery
description: Santa Present Delivery is a free online game from genre of puzzle and jigsaw games. You can select one of the 12 images and then select one of the three modes: easy with 25 pieces, medium with 49 pieces and hard with 100 pieces. Have fun and enjoy!
instructions: Use the mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

description: Play this slide puzzle games of the christmas 2020. It's include 3 images and 3 modes (3x3 pieces, 4x4 pieces, 5x5 pieces) to play.

description: Play this slide puzzle games of the christmas snowman. It's include 3 images and 3 modes (3x3 pieces, 4x4 pieces, 5x5 pieces) to play.

title: Snowman 2020 Puzzle
description: Play with 6 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Snowman 2020 Puzzle. All images is with the snowman. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 christmas games.

title: Christmas Trucks Memory
description: Christmas Trucks Memory is a game where you have to memorize the positions of different Christmas trucks and then hit them in the fastest time. Try to pass all levels of this game. The time when the positions of the trucks are shown is short. Try to memorize more pictures before the game starts.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Jigsaw Puzzle Christmas
description: Christmas is coming. Play Jigsaw puzzle and enjoy the holidays. There are many beautiful images. The grid size is customizable. How fast can you solve these challenging puzzles? Play now! Merry X'mas!
instructions: Drag and drop.

title: Piggy In The Puddle Christmas
description: Puzzle out how to get the tiny swine into the tub full of mud. Clear the way and remove obstacles by using the special skills of other animals. You also can switch your pig's shape to make it roll or stop. Try to reach your target as you pick up all acorns along the way. Much fun with Piggy In The Puddle 3!
instructions: Guide the pig into his tub of mud by changing his shape and enlisting the help of his Arctic friends. Don't forget to collect the acorns!

title: Candy Blocks Collapse
description: Collapse the candy blocks by connecting 2 or more similar candy. Collapse 6 or more candy to get a bomb. More points are awarded as larger connections are made.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 candy blcok games.

title: Sliding Blocks
description: Help your orange blocks to reach the indicated locations. Move blocks in the right direction, they will move until they hit an obstacle or a wall. You will be able to initiate a new movement in a new direction. Have a nice game!
instructions: Use arrows to move the blocks.
